title: Quirky Clean
content:
I need to find some good, versatile fonts that are "clean & a bit quirky" without being silly or too far in any one direction... So far I think Archer & Museo \*(not Museo Sans) fit the bill...

Anyone have other suggestions that have similar qualities to Museo or Archer?

Also; what's up with Museo not having italics? I could really use them... Are they coming? Is there another font that could masquerade as Museo italics? (thought about vista sans italics for a second...)
author: matthew cogswell
